comment_regular_data.body: Not quite ready to merge yet. I caught a SIGSEGV when I closed an audio group the first time I tried to test it. Will investigate further when I have time to do more thorough testing.

Current issues:
- The segfault isn't fixed (https://gist.github.com/JFreegman/d1ec387ea9c17da57f0ec31e3985813f)
- `/mute` with no argument doesn't always work
- `/mute` should print a message indicating that so and so is muted or unmuted
- Tab completion should work for `/mute`
- The group section of the help menu should have entries for `/lsdev` and `/sdev` (audio commands should be split up the same way they are in the chat help menu)
- What happens if two peers share the same nick?

We now have at most one input and one output device open at any time,
but can have multiple capture callbacks and multiple output sources.
